item.title: 达美航空公司将暂停纽约与特拉维夫之间的航班
item.description: 达美航空公司（Delta Air Lines）周四表示，由于中东地区的安全问题不断升级，该公司将暂停纽约-肯尼迪机场与特拉维夫之间的航班，直至 12 月 31 日。【原文：Delta Air Lines said on Thursday it will pause its flights between New York-JFK and Tel Aviv through Dec. 31, due to escalating security concerns in the Middle East.】

item.title: Terraform Labs 在与美国证券交易委员会达成和解后获准破产清算
item.description: Terraform Labs 周四获得了法院批准，在同意与美国证券交易委员会达成和解后，将以破产方式结束其业务。美国证券交易委员会指控 Terraform Labs 在 2022 年 TerraUSD 和 Luna 代币崩盘时，欺骗了约 400 亿美元损失的加密货币投资者。【原文：Terraform Labs received court approval on Thursday to wind down its operations in bankruptcy after agreeing to settle a U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission lawsuit accusing the company of defrauding cryptocurrency investors who lost an estimated $40 billion when the TerraUSD and Luna tokens collapsed in 2022.】

item.title: 蒙特利尔银行将标准普尔 500 指数 2024 年的目标从 5,600 点上调至 6,100 点
item.description: 蒙特利尔银行资本市场（BMO Capital Markets）周四表示，将 2024 年的 S&P 500 指数目标从 5,600 点上调至 6,100 点。【原文：BMO Capital Markets on Thursday said it was raising its S&P 500 target for 2024 to 6,100 from 5,600.】

item.title: 总统表示，可口可乐计划向尼日利亚业务投资 10 亿美元
item.description: 尼日利亚总统博拉-蒂努布（Bola Tinubu）周四与软饮料生产商可口可乐公司的高级管理人员会面后表示，可口可乐公司计划在未来五年内向其尼日利亚业务投资 10 亿美元。【原文：Coca-Cola plans to invest $1 billion in its Nigeria operations over the next five years, the country's presidency said after a meeting between President Bola Tinubu and senior executives of the soft drinks maker on Thursday.】

item.title: 内幕交易限制取消，特朗普传媒股票面临潜在抛售
item.description: 美国前总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）表示，他不会在限制措施可能于周四到期后出售其持有的特朗普传媒公司（Trump Media）17 亿美元的股份，但其他内部人士可能很快就会兑现他们的收益。【原文：While former U.S. President Donald Trump has said he will not sell his $1.7 billion stake in Trump Media after restrictions likely expire on Thursday, other insiders could soon cash in their gains.】

item.title: BNSF 铁路公司与 SMART 工会达成临时协议
item.description: 伯克希尔-哈撒韦公司（Berkshire Hathaway）旗下的 BNSF 铁路公司周四表示，已与国际金属薄板、航空、铁路和运输工人协会（SMART）工会达成一项为期五年的临时协议。【原文：Berkshire Hathaway-owned BNSF Railway said on Thursday it has reached a tentative agreement, for a five-year deal, with the International Association of Sheet Metal, Air, Rail and Transportation Workers (SMART) union.】

item.title: 世界银行气候融资在 2024 财年达到创纪录的 426 亿美元
item.description: 世界银行集团（World Bank Group）周四表示，该集团在 2024 财年提供了创纪录的 426 亿美元气候融资，比上一年的 386 亿美元增长了 10%，并接近其气候项目融资占总融资 45% 的目标。【原文：The World Bank Group said on Thursday it delivered a record $42.6 billion in climate finance during fiscal 2024, a 10% increase over the $38.6 billion the prior year and close to its target of a 45% share of total financing devoted to climate projects.】

item.title: 通用汽车的 Cruise 将开始在加州测试自动驾驶汽车
item.description: 通用汽车公司（General Motors）的自动驾驶部门 Cruise 周四表示，将于今年秋季在加州湾区开始对多达五辆自动驾驶汽车进行监督测试。【原文：General Motors' self-driving unit Cruise said on Thursday it will begin supervised testing with up to five autonomous vehicles in fall this year in California's Bay Area.】

item.title: 堪萨斯城联储前主席认为大幅降息后通胀风险重现
item.description: 堪萨斯城联储前主席周四表示，美国央行降息半个百分点的决定留下了通胀重新抬头的风险。【原文：The U.S. central bank's decision to cut interest rates by half a percentage point leaves open the risk of a resurgence in inflation, a former Kansas City Federal Reserve president said on Thursday.】

item.title: 麦格理部门将支付近 8000 万美元了结美国证券交易委员会指控
item.description: 美国证券交易委员会表示，麦格理集团（Macquarie Group）的一家投资顾问公司已同意支付 7980 万美元，以了结与高估顾问账户中持有的抵押按揭债务（CMO）有关的指控。【原文：A Macquarie Group investment adviser has agreed to pay $79.8 million to settle charges in connection with overvaluing collateralized mortgage obligations (CMO) held in advisory accounts, the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission said.】

item.title: Airbnb 首席执行官称公司专注于提高长期住宿率
item.description: 随着雅典和巴塞罗那等旅游热点地区的短期租赁业务受到越来越多的关注，度假租赁公司 Airbnb 看到了发展长期租赁业务的巨大商机。【原文：Vacation rental company Airbnb sees a huge opportunity to grow its long-term rental business as short-term rentals are under growing scrutiny in tourist hot spots like Athens and Barcelona.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：黑客攻击暴露公司数据后，迪士尼将停止使用 Salesforce 旗下的 Slack
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四援引一份备忘录报道，在一个黑客实体在网上泄露了超过 1 TB 的公司数据后，华特迪士尼计划不再使用 Slack 作为全公司的工作场所协作系统。【原文：Walt Disney plans to transition away from its use of Slack as a companywide workplace collaboration system, after a hacking entity leaked online more than a terabyte of company data, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday, citing a memo.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：对冲基金 Two Sigma 正与美国证券交易委员会进行和解谈判
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周四报道，对冲基金 Two Sigma 可能需要支付多达 1 亿美元，以解决美国证券交易委员会对该公司交易丑闻的调查。【原文：Hedge fund Two Sigma is likely to have to pay as much as $100 million to resolve a U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission probe into a trading scandal at the firm, the Wall Street Journal reported on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国食品和药物管理局（FDA）批准伊兰科公司的狗皮炎治疗药物
item.description: 美国食品和药物管理局网站周四显示，美国食品和药物管理局已经批准了 Elanco Animal Health 公司的狗皮炎治疗药物。【原文：The U.S. Food and Drug Administration has approved Elanco Animal Health's dermatitis treatment for dogs, the health regulator's website showed on Thursday.】

item.title: 美国 30 年期固定利率抵押贷款降至 6.09
item.description: 本周，美国抵押贷款利率降至逾 1 年半以来的最低水平，在美联储自 2020 年以来首次降息后，利率可能会进一步下降。【原文：U.S. mortgage rates dropped to the lowest level in more than 1-1/2 years this week and could fall further after the Federal Reserve cut interest rates for the first time since 2020.】

item.title: 联合太平洋公司预计未来三年收入增长将快于运量增长
item.description: 美国联合太平洋铁路公司（Union Pacific）周四表示，预计未来三年的收入增长速度将超过运量增长速度，超过市场增长速度。【原文：U.S. railroad Union Pacific said on Thursday it expects its revenue to grow faster than volumes over the next three years, outpacing the market.】

item.title: 参议员马可-卢比奥寻求禁止中国企业通过在其他国家生产来规避美国关税
item.description: 美国共和党参议员马可-卢比奥（Marco Rubio）周四提议，禁止中国制造商通过在墨西哥、越南或马来西亚等其他国家设厂来享受美国有利的贸易规则。【原文：Republican U.S. Senator Marco Rubio on Thursday proposed to bar Chinese manufactures from benefiting from favorable U.S. trade rules by setting up factories in other countries like Mexico, Vietnam or Malaysia.】

item.title: AMC、Regal 和其他美国连锁影院计划投资 22 亿美元进行影院升级改造
item.description: 一个行业组织周四宣布，包括 AMC Entertainment、Regal Cinemas 和 Cinemark 在内的最大连锁影院将在未来三年内投资超过 22 亿美元，用于升级美国和加拿大的影院。【原文：The largest theater chains including AMC Entertainment , Regal Cinemas and Cinemark will invest more than $2.2 billion over the next three years to upgrade theaters in the U.S. and Canada, an industry group announced on Thursday.】

item.title: Live Nation 寻求终止美国各州对音乐会观众的损害赔偿要求
item.description: Live Nation Entertainment 公司周四请求纽约联邦法官驳回几个州的诉讼请求，这些州指控 Live Nation Entertainment 通过扼杀其门票销售部门 Ticketmaster 的竞争，损害了活动观众的利益。【原文：Live Nation Entertainment asked a federal judge in New York on Thursday to dismiss several states' claims that the live event promoter harmed event-goers by stifling competition with its ticket-selling arm, Ticketmaster.】

item.title: SpaceX "坚决拒绝 "美国联邦航空局对其违反发射要求的指控
item.description: SpaceX 周四表示，它 "强烈反对 "联邦航空管理局关于它未能遵守许可证要求以及在 2023 年两次发射前未获得变更批准的说法。【原文：SpaceX said Thursday it "forcefully rejects" the Federal Aviation Administration's contention it failed to follow license requirements and did not get approval for changes before two launches in 2023.】

item.title: 美国 8 月成屋销售下降，供应改善
item.description: 美国 8 月份成屋销售降幅超过预期，原因是尽管供应持续改善，但房价依然居高不下。【原文：U.S. existing home sales fell more than expected in August as house prices remained elevated despite a continued improvement in supply.】

item.title: 美国第二季度经常账户赤字因进口急剧扩大
item.description: 由于商品进口激增，美国第二季度经常账户赤字急剧扩大，达到两年多来的最高水平。【原文：The U.S. current account deficit widened sharply in the second quarter, reaching its highest level in more than two years amid a surge in imports of goods.】

item.title: 亚马逊为卖家增加聊天机器人，提高自动化水平
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）周四宣布了一项新的人工智能应用，称该应用将帮助其独立卖家进行销售指标、库存维护和产品广告等方面的工作。【原文：Amazon.com announced on Thursday a new artificial intelligence application that it says will help its independent sellers with sales metrics, inventory maintenance and product advertising, among other things.】

item.title: 美国联邦贸易委员会称，社交媒体用户无法控制人工智能使用的数据
item.description: 美国联邦贸易委员会在周四发布的一份报告中说，社交媒体公司收集、共享和处理大量用户信息，但却几乎不提供透明度或控制，包括人工智能系统如何使用这些信息。【原文：Social media companies collect, share and process vast troves of information about their users while offering little transparency or control, including over how it is used by systems incorporating artificial intelligence, the U.S. Federal Trade Commission said in a report released on Thursday.】

item.title: 美联储（终于）加入全球降息周期
item.description: 美国联邦储备委员会加入了全球宽松周期，降息幅度超过预期的半个百分点。【原文：The U.S. Federal Reserve has joined a global easing cycle with a larger-than-anticipated half-point interest rate reduction.】

item.title: 交易员押注美联储下次降息幅度将更小
item.description: 周四，在经济数据显示失业保险申请人数意外下降后，交易员们加大了对美国联邦储备委员会下一次降息幅度将小于周三降息幅度的押注。【原文：Traders on Thursday added to bets the U.S. Federal Reserve's next rate cut will be smaller than the one it delivered on Wednesday, after economic data showed an unexpected drop in unemployment insurance claims.】

item.title: 穆迪称欧洲银行可能缺乏足够的贷款损失保障来应对房地产市场下滑
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）周四的一份报告称，如果严重的压力导致问题贷款快速增长，欧洲银行可能没有为房地产贷款违约做好充分准备，但判断贷款机构可能有足够强大的资本缓冲来应对。【原文：European banks may not be sufficiently provisioned for property loan defaults if severe pressure leads to rapid growth in problem loans, a report by Moody's Ratings said on Thursday, but judged lenders likely had strong enough capital buffers to cope.】

item.title: 食品公司味之素和达能为减少乳制品行业的二氧化碳排放建立合作关系
item.description: 食品公司味之素（Ajinomoto）和达能（Danone）周四宣布建立合作关系，以减少乳制品行业的温室气体排放。【原文：Food companies Ajinomoto and Danone unveiled on Thursday a partnership to reduce the dairy industry's greenhouse gas emissions.】

item.title: 美国每周申请失业救济人数意外下降
item.description: 数据显示，9 月份就业增长有所加快。【原文：The data suggests job growth picked up in September.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称壳牌德国炼油厂股权出售面临延期
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的人士称，壳牌出售德国施韦德特炼油厂股份的计划因第三方未决诉讼而被推迟，使该公司等待多年的资产剥离计划停滞不前。【原文：Shell's planned sale of a stake in the Schwedt refinery in Germany is being delayed by pending lawsuits by third parties, two people familiar with the matter said, stalling a divestment the company has waited years for.】
